summary: SWOT is a strategic planning technique used to identify strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats related to business competition or project planning. The tag encompasses resources aimed at helping individuals and startups to conduct thorough SWOT analyses, ultimately improving their strategic planning and alignment for success. Key areas of focus include personal and professional growth, skill enhancement, and effective goal communication.
excerpt: Begin by discovering your personal strengths to understand where you excel. Embrace your weaknesses to turn them into areas of growth. Perform a SWOT analysis of your startup to identify internal and external factors.
